en.title: Choosing Toys for Your Kitten: Age-Appropriate Recommendations and Safe Play Tips
en.content:
Toys are essential items for kittens, providing exercise, mental stimulation, and an outlet for their hunting instincts. Choose them with safety in mind.

Recommended Toys

Feather wands, balls, tunnels, puzzle feeders, and kick toys. Have both interactive toys for playing together and solo toys for independent play.

Safety Precautions

Strings, ribbons, and small parts pose a choking hazard, so put them away when not in use during supervised play. Accidents involving cats chewing off and swallowing wand strings are surprisingly common. Regularly check toys for damage and replace worn-out ones.

zh.title: 幼猫玩具选购指南：按月龄推荐及安全玩耍方法
zh.content:
玩具对于幼猫来说是非常重要的物品，能够提供运动、智力刺激和释放狩猎本能的机会。选择时请注意安全性。

推荐的玩具

逗猫棒（带羽毛等）、球类、隧道、益智喂食器、踢咬玩具。请同时准备与主人一起玩的互动玩具和适合独自玩耍的玩具。

安全注意事项

绳子、缎带和小零件有误食的危险，不玩的时候请收好。猫咬断逗猫棒绳子并吞下去的事故意外地常见。请定期检查玩具是否破损，及时更换老化的玩具。
